author: Paul Rankin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Heat the honey, butter and sugar in a non-stick frying pan for a few minutes. Add the peach halves to the pan and allow to caramelise for a few minutes.  Transfer to the oven and heat for 8-10 minutes. Remove from the oven, transfer to a serving plate and serve the Stilton slices alongside.
ingredients: 2 tbsp honey,  1 tbsp unsalted butter,  55g/2oz caster sugar,  2 peaches, cut in half and stone removed,  2 slices Stilton, to serve
